plot: More than 25 years after the release of Italy's first gay themed film, _Giornata particolare, Una (1977)_ 4 queer youths tell of what it was like today to come out; to themselves, to their families, and to the world.
title: Appunti su una giornata particolare
plot_es: More than 25 years after the release of Italy's first gay themed film, _Giornata particolare, Una (1977)_ 4 queer youths tell of what it was like today to come out; to themselves, to their families, and to the world.
plot_en: More than 25 years after the release of Italy's first gay themed film, _Giornata particolare, Una (1977)_ 4 queer youths tell of what it was like today to come out; to themselves, to their families, and to the world.
